general: Extract the following information from the given event data from the user.

description.description: The description of the event. Slightly shortened if too long.

price.description: The price of the event in EUR

age.description: The minimum age for the event

tags.description: The tags or categories that the event belongs to

start_date.description: The start date of the event in %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ format

end_date.description: The end date of the event in %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ format

accessibility.description: The accessibility of the event. Keep it short.

address.description: The address where the event takes place

city.description: The city where the event takes place
